title: William Howard Taft National Historic Site: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park                   News               Photos & Multimedia               History & Culture               Education               Kids & Youth               Management               Bookstore         Â    William Howard Taft National Historic Site preserves and interprets the history and legacy of the nation's 27th President and 10th Chief Justice of the U.S. Supreme Court, William Howard Taft.  Learn more about this dedicated public servant and the story of the park when you explore this website.     News Current news and happenings about the park and park-related events.   Photos & Multimedia View official park photos, recorded events and the official park film.   History & Culture In the 19th century, the Mount Auburn area was known as the "Fifth Avenue" of Cincinnati.  Rivaling the Fifth Avenue in New York City, Mt. Auburn boasted the most notable people in Cincinnati and throughout the nation.   Kids & Youth See what the park has to offer for our youngest visitors. From earning Junior Ranger SWAG to printable activities, we make learning fun!    Management Learn about the history of the park and view important information about park operations.    Bookstore The William Howard Taft NHS bookstore has a wide array of gifts for sale to help you remember and cherish your visit to the park.
